MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH2 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Thistle Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 10:31PM. Our engineers are on their way to the local substation to investigate and repair a suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:45AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:55PM on 27 October 2020.
